data.title: Laptop for Families
paragraphs: Mail us your used or new laptop. We'll set up the donated laptops in our public computer room for the families to use for free. Some of the donated laptops will go to the families who don't have home computers, or who don't have enough computers for all their children to use.

data.title: Hygiene Kits
paragraphs: Order a bulk pack of hygiene kits for us to share with people experiencing homelessness.
Each hygiene kit allows an unhoused individual to freshen up and feel more confident about their hygiene for work, school, or even just to have a better day.
data.address: 1543 E Palmdale Blvd, Ste E, Palmdale, CA 93550
data.label: Ship the kits to:
